text: Dennis Lawrence (born 1 August 1974) is a Trinidad and Tobago football player. He plays for San Juan Jabloteh and Trinidad and Tobago national team. ==Career statistics== :Scores and results list Trinidad and Tobago's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Lawrence goal. List of international goals scored by Dennis Lawrence No. Date Venue Opponent Score Result Competition 1 19 May 2001 Hasely Crawford Stadium, Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago 1–2 Caribbean Cup 2 25 May 2005 Hasely Crawford Stadium, Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago 4–0 Friendly 3 4 June 2005 Hasely Crawford Stadium, Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago 2–0 2006 FIFA World Cup qualification 4 16 November 2005 Bahrain National Stadium, Riffa, Bahrain 1–0 2006 FIFA World Cup qualification 5 3 September 2008 Hasely Crawford Stadium, Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago 3–0 Friendly ==Managerial statistics== Managerial record by team and tenure Team Nat From To Record Trinidad and Tobago 30 January 2017 14 December 2019 Total ==Honours== Wrexham *FAW Premier Cup: 2000–01, 2002–03, 2003–04 *Football League Trophy: 2005 *Player of the season: 2003–04 Swansea *Football League One: 2007–08 Trinidad and Tobago *Caribbean Cup: 2001 *Caribbean Cup MVP: 2001 Individual *Chaconia Medal Gold Class, 2006 ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Trinidad and Tobago footballers
title: Dennis Lawrence
